source:
TEXT_LUCKZE103_03458_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
Callea wears an expression of grave concern.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE103_03458_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Schwierigkeitsanpassung<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
Callea ist in großer Unruhe.

source:
TEXT_LUCKZE103_03458_SEQ_01<tab>Callea shares with you the incident that has been weighing on her mind. It would seem that while you were making arrangements for her lodgings at the Crystarium, a young soldier was carried to the infirmary in dire condition, suffering from a most virulent poison inflicted upon him by a roving beast. Though the girl was able to find a recipe for an antidote in her father's records, she will require a sample of the selfsame poison in order to prepare the medicine. Moved by her resolve and decisiveness, you resolve to accompany the girl to the woods west of the forest and help her procure the venom she needs.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE103_03458_SEQ_01<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var><var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Die Schwierigkeit des Auftrags wird an die aktuelle Stufe angepasst.

Callea will ein Serum herstellen, um einen vergifteten Soldaten zu retten. Dazu braucht sie einen Wirkstoff, den ihr im Wald des Verirrten Hirten auftreiben wollt. Sprich dort wieder mit Callea.

source: TEXT_LUCKZE103_03458_SEQ_02<tab>You arrive in the forest, where Callea once again thanks you for your aid. She provides you with a phial to be used in collecting the sample of venom, as well as a word of warning: the medicine must be mixed while the venom is still fresh, meaning that if you tarry too long, you will have to procure a sample anew. Keeping this in mind, you scour the area in search of one of the ghastly creatures known as violet triffids.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE103_03458_SEQ_02<tab>Du sollst Callea ein bestimmtes Gift beschaffen. Finde <var 32 ((BNpcName)) 02F22136020502 /var>, überwältige die Kreatur und fange <var 32 ((EventItem)) 03F61E8EEB020502 /var> auf.

source: TEXT_LUCKZE103_03458_SEQ_03<tab>You were able to procure a suitable sample of venom from a violet triffid. Deliver it to Callea with all speed, that she might mix the antidote while the poison is still fresh.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE103_03458_SEQ_03<tab>Du hast das Gift besorgt. Gib es Callea im Wald des Verirrten Hirten.

source: TEXT_LUCKZE103_03458_SEQ_04<tab>You safely and swiftly deliver the venom to Callea, who proclaims it perfect for preparing the antidote that will cure the poor soldier. Watch over and see that she is safe as she performs the task.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE103_03458_SEQ_04<tab>Callea dankt dir und macht sich gleich daran, das Serum herzustellen.

source: TEXT_LUCKZE103_03458_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Callea in the Forest of the Lost Shepherd.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE103_03458_TODO_00<tab>Im Wald des Verirrten Hirten mit Callea sprechen

source: TEXT_LUCKZE103_03458_TODO_01<tab>Obtain poisonous sap from a violet triffid.
TEXT_LUCKZE103_03458_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the poisonous sap to Callea.
TEXT_LUCKZE103_03458_NIELDEN_100_000<tab>I fear the news isn't good, friend. Ye'd best hear it from Callea herself.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE103_03458_NIELDEN_100_000<tab>Die Umstände haben sich inzwischen etwas geändert. Callea wird es dir erklären.

source: TEXT_LUCKZE103_03458_CALLEA_000_000<tab>My apologies, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I fear we have a bit of a situation on our hands. While you were away kindly making arrangements for me at the Crystarium, a young man was rushed here with the most horrific symptoms...
target: TEXT_LUCKZE103_03458_CALLEA_000_000<tab>Während du weg warst, hat man einen Notfallpatienten in die Praxis gebracht. Im Moment schläft er.

source: TEXT_LUCKZE103_03458_NIELDEN_000_001<tab>Aye, one of the new recruits here at Fort Jobb. A nasty fiend got him─one o' those damn tree men─an' got him bad. As his brothers-in-arms tell it, he was lucky to survive. Sadly, he won't be survivin' much longer in his current state.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE103_03458_NIELDEN_000_001<tab>Es ist ein Soldat, der hier auf der Festung stationiert war. Sein Kamerad berichtete, dass sie auf ihrer Patrouille von einem Sünden<var 16 /var>ver<var 16 /var>tilger angegriffen wurden.

source: TEXT_LUCKZE103_03458_NIELDEN_000_002<tab>See, the beast that nicked him had some nasty venom in its claws. The way the poor boy's convulsin', it's probably spreadin' through his body even as we speak. He's restin' in bed for now, but if we don't do somethin' soon...
target: TEXT_LUCKZE103_03458_NIELDEN_000_002<tab>Es muss sich um ein giftiges Exemplar gehandelt haben. Das Gift beginnt bereits zu wirken. Einen weiteren Transport sollten wir lieber nicht riskieren.

source: TEXT_LUCKZE103_03458_CALLEA_000_003<tab>Searching through Father's belongings, I found a book containing recipes for a wide variety of antidotes. The instructions seem clear enough─I am quite confident I could mix one up provided I had the proper ingredients.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE103_03458_CALLEA_000_003<tab>In der Hinterlassenschaft meines Vaters habe ich ein Rezept für ein Gegengift gefunden. Wenn ich mich genau danach richte, kann ich vielleicht ein Serum herstellen.

source: TEXT_LUCKZE103_03458_CALLEA_000_004<tab>Unfortunately, that's easier said than done. The most vital ingredient is a swab of the original poison with which the man was stricken. And furthermore, the medicine must be mixed immediately after obtaining the sample, while the venom is still fresh...
target: TEXT_LUCKZE103_03458_CALLEA_000_004<tab>Dazu bräuchte ich einen bestimmten Wirkstoff. Er muss sofort verarbeitet werden, sonst verändern sich seine Eigenschaften. Glücklicherweise gibt es hier in der Nähe <var 32 ((BNpcName)) 06F22136030502 /var>, die diesen Wirkstoff in ihrem Inneren produzieren.

source: TEXT_LUCKZE103_03458_CALLEA_000_005<tab>We know precisely which type of beast did it, and they are more than plentiful in these parts. We would not have to travel far to procure the poison, provided we had someone with the strength to fell the fiend...
target: TEXT_LUCKZE103_03458_CALLEA_000_005<tab>Die Leute hier in der Festung waren immer gut zu mir. Wenn ich einen von ihnen vor dem sicheren Tod retten kann, dann muss ich es versuchen!

source: TEXT_LUCKZE103_03458_CALLEA_000_006<tab>The soldiers here have been so kind to my father and me... I simply cannot let them down in their time of need! Oh, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I beg of you...will you help me!?
target: TEXT_LUCKZE103_03458_CALLEA_000_006<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, bitte hilf mir. Du musst das Gift beschaffen und ich mische sofort an Ort und Stelle das Serum.

source: TEXT_LUCKZE103_03458_NIELDEN_000_007<tab>Ye can count on ol' Nielden too, my girl! I'm no slouch in battle after all, or have ye forgotten?
target: TEXT_LUCKZE103_03458_NIELDEN_000_007<tab>Dann komme ich auch mit. Ich bin schließlich Soldat, und gegen all das Getier da draußen könnt ihr Hilfe gebrauchen.

source: TEXT_LUCKZE103_03458_CALLEA_000_008<tab>Thank you, Uncle Nielden...but no. You must stay here with our patient. Make sure that he has water to drink, and tell him that I will return shortly with the antidote.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE103_03458_CALLEA_000_008<tab>Nein, Nielden, lass nur. Bitte bleib du hier bei dem Vergifteten. Ich lasse dir ein starkes Schmerzmittel da, falls seine Qual unerträglich wird.

source: TEXT_LUCKZE103_03458_NIELDEN_000_009<tab>...Aye, I understand. Watch yerself out there, Callea.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE103_03458_NIELDEN_000_009<tab>Also gut. Dann euch beiden viel Glück.

source: TEXT_LUCKZE103_03458_CALLEA_000_010<tab>All right, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, we've no time to lose! The creatures we seek lurk in the woodlands just west of the fort. I will meet you there!
target: TEXT_LUCKZE103_03458_CALLEA_000_010<tab>Brechen wir gleich auf. Im Wald westlich der Festung müssten wir <var 32 ((BNpcName)) 02F22136020502 /var> finden können.

source: TEXT_LUCKZE103_03458_CALLEA_000_020<tab>Here we are, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Do you see those ghastly living trees? These are the fiends that poisoned that poor soldier. Here is a phial you may use to collect the sample.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE103_03458_CALLEA_000_020<tab>Hier sieht man manchmal <var 32 ((BNpcName)) 06F22136030502 /var>. Sobald eine dieser Kreaturen auftaucht, musst du sie überwältigen und dann <var 32 ((EventItem)) 03F61E8EEB020502 /var> auffangen.

source: TEXT_LUCKZE103_03458_CALLEA_100_021<tab>Father's records made it clear that the venom is quick to break down. If too much time passes, I will have to ask you to collect a fresh sample.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE103_03458_CALLEA_100_021<tab>Im Notizbuch meines Vaters stand, dass die Flüssigkeit an der Luft sofort zu oxidieren beginnt. Das Gift muss unbedingt in gutem Zustand sein. Wenn du bei <var 32 ((BNpcName)) 02F22136020402 /var> nichts Brauchbares abzapfen kannst, versuch es beim nächsten!

source: TEXT_LUCKZE103_03458_CALLEA_000_021<tab>Also, be warned: these beasts are not likely to part with their poison willingly. Like as not, you will have to weaken them somewhat before they allow you to get close enough to do the deed. Be safe, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I will stand by here and prepare the rest of the ingredients.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE103_03458_CALLEA_000_021<tab>Es sollte eine scharlachrote Flüssigkeit sein. Wenn du die hast, gib sie mir. Das Rezept für das Serum habe ich bei mir<var 1D /var>... Hoffentlich gelingt es gleich beim ersten Versuch.

source: TEXT_LUCKZE103_03458_CALLEA_000_022<tab>Have you procured the sample yet? You must hurry! A young man's life depends on it!
target: TEXT_LUCKZE103_03458_CALLEA_000_022<tab>Hier sieht man manchmal <var 32 ((BNpcName)) 06F22136030502 /var>. Sobald eine dieser Kreaturen auftaucht, musst du sie überwältigen und dann <var 32 ((EventItem)) 03F61E8EEB020502 /var> auffangen.

source: TEXT_LUCKZE103_03458_CALLEA_000_030<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Is that what I think it is?
target: TEXT_LUCKZE103_03458_CALLEA_000_030<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Ich habe Kampfgeräusche gehört. Konntest du genügend von dem Gift beschaffen?

source: TEXT_LUCKZE103_03458_CALLEA_000_031<tab>Perfect! Yes, I do believe this is exactly what I need to mix up the antidote!
target: TEXT_LUCKZE103_03458_CALLEA_000_031<tab>Ein Glück! Das müsste ausreichen! Ich mache mich gleich an die Arbeit.
